content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (62.0, -54.0) with a source of stone and a result of stone bricks.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -80.0) with a source of iron ore and a result of iron plates, and another stone furnace at position (52.0, -82.0) with a source of copper ore and a result of copper plates.

### Steam Engine at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (5.5, 0.5) with a small electric pole at position (3.5, 0.5) and a pipe at position (5.5, 3.5).

### Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (-7.5, 25.5) with a pipe at position (-7.5, 24.5) and a pipe at position (-6.5, 24.5).

### Pipe Group
Consists of a pipe group with multiple pipes connecting the offshore pump at position (-7.5, 25.5) to the steam engine at position (5.5, 0.5).

### Electricity Group
Consists of an electricity group with a small electric pole at position (3.5, 0.5) and a voltage of 0.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity has available space before attempting to insert items.
- Make sure the item is compatible with the entity.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected.
- Make sure the connection points are available and not occupied by other entities.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure there are resources available to harvest at the specified location.
- Make sure the agent is close enough to the resource to harvest it.

### Errors when getting resource patches
- Ensure there are resources available at the specified location.
- Make sure the agent has the necessary permissions to access the resource.

### Errors when moving to positions
- Ensure the position is valid and accessible.
- Make sure the agent has the necessary permissions to move to the position.
